snippet: The productivity increase came after a first-quarter contraction of 4.5 percent.
abstract: Labor Dept says productivity increased at 2.5 percent annual rate in second quarter 2014, after contracting at revised 4.5 percent pace in first quarter.
lead_paragraph: The productivity increase came after a first-quarter contraction of 4.5 percent.

headline.main: U.S. Productivity Rose 2.5 Percent in the 2nd Quarter
headline.print_headline: U.S. Productivity Rose 2.5 Percent in the 2nd Quarter
